snippet: Constellation Brands, which brews Corona and, said that it was expanding capacity at its brewery in Mexico.
abstract: Constellation Brands, which brews Corona and several other products, will expand capacity at its Mexico brewery in an effort to increase its market share in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Constellation Brands, which brews Corona and, said that it was expanding capacity at its brewery in Mexico.

headline.main: Alcohol Maker Increases Capacity at Brewery
headline.print_headline: Alcohol Maker Increases Capacity at Brewery
